mapper.insert: insert into billing_keys( user_no, billing_key, next_billing_date, price, content ) values( #{userNo}, #{billingKey}, #{nextBillingDate}, #{price}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select user_no, billing_key, next_billing_date, price, content from billing_keys where #{nowAt} >= next_billing_date
mapper.update: update billing_keys set next_billing_date = DATE_ADD(#{nextBillingDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), billing_error_count=0 where user_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select user_no, billing_error_count from billing_keys where billing_error_count >= 1
mapper.delete: update billing_keys set billing_keys = NULL where user_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from billing_keys where user_no = #{no}
